# RachaAI - Mobile App Wireframes
## Native iOS/Android & PWA Mobile Experience

*Generated by Sally - UX Expert & Mobile Specialist*
*Created: December 2024*

---

## Mobile App Overview

This document contains comprehensive mobile app wireframes for RachaAI, designed for native iOS/Android apps and Progressive Web App (PWA) with Brazilian mobile optimization.

---

## 1. Native iOS App Wireframes

### 1.1 Main Chat Interface (iOS)

**Screen:** `MainChatView`

```typescript
interface MainChatView {
  // Navigation
  navigation: {
    title: "RachaAI";
    leftButton: "menu";
    rightButton: "settings";
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Tela principal do RachaAI";
      navigation: "Swipe left for menu, tap settings";
    };
  };
  
  // Chat interface
  chatInterface: {
    messages: {
      userMessage: {
        bubble: "rounded-right";
        backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
        textColor: "white";
        timestamp: "right-aligned";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Sua mensagem: {content}";
        };
      };
      aiResponse: {
        bubble: "rounded-left";
        backgroundColor: "#F3F4F6";
        textColor: "#1F2937";
        culturalPattern: {
          icon: "üç£"; // Rod√≠zio, üç∫ Happy Hour, etc.
          badge: "cultural-pattern";
          color: "#10B981";
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Claude: {content}. Padr√£o cultural detectado: {pattern}";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Input area
    inputArea: {
      textInput: {
        placeholder: "Descreva sua despesa...";
        multiline: true;
        maxHeight: 120;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Campo de texto para descrever despesa";
          hint: "Digite ou use o microfone";
        };
      };
      
      // Action buttons
      actionButtons: {
        voiceButton: {
          icon: "üé§";
          color: "#EF4444";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de voz. Toque para ativar microfone";
          };
        };
        cameraButton: {
          icon: "üì∑";
          color: "#10B981";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de c√¢mera. Toque para escanear recibo";
          };
        };
        sendButton: {
          icon: "üì§";
          color: "#2563EB";
          disabled: "gray";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o enviar. Toque para enviar mensagem";
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Quick actions
  quickActions: {
    type: "horizontal-scroll";
    actions: [
      {
        icon: "üç£";
        label: "Rod√≠zio";
        action: "quick-rodizio";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "A√ß√£o r√°pida: Rod√≠zio japon√™s";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "üç∫";
        label: "Happy Hour";
        action: "quick-happy-hour";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "A√ß√£o r√°pida: Happy Hour";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "üéÇ";
        label: "Anivers√°rio";
        action: "quick-aniversario";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "A√ß√£o r√°pida: Anivers√°rio";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "ü•©";
        label: "Churrasco";
        action: "quick-churrasco";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "A√ß√£o r√°pida: Churrasco";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "üéÅ";
        label: "Vaquinha";
        action: "quick-vaquinha";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "A√ß√£o r√°pida: Vaquinha";
        };
      }
    ];
  };
}
```

### 1.2 Payment Confirmation (iOS)

**Screen:** `PaymentConfirmationView`

```typescript
interface PaymentConfirmationView {
  // Payment summary
  paymentSummary: {
    header: {
      title: "Confirma√ß√£o de Pagamento";
      subtitle: "Rod√≠zio Japon√™s";
      icon: "üç£";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Confirma√ß√£o de pagamento. Rod√≠zio japon√™s";
      };
    };
    
    details: {
      totalAmount: {
        label: "Valor Total";
        value: "R$ 180,00";
        fontSize: "large";
        color: "#1F2937";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Valor total: R$ 180,00";
        };
      };
      participants: {
        label: "Participantes";
        value: "4 pessoas";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "4 participantes";
        };
      };
      individualPayment: {
        label: "Cada um paga";
        value: "R$ 45,00";
        fontSize: "x-large";
        color: "#10B981";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Cada pessoa paga R$ 45,00";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // PIX integration
    pixIntegration: {
      qrCode: {
        size: "200x200";
        border: "rounded";
        shadow: "medium";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "QR Code PIX para R$ 45,00. Toque para ampliar";
        };
      };
      
      sharingOptions: {
        whatsapp: {
          icon: "üì±";
          label: "WhatsApp";
          color: "#25D366";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Compartilhar via WhatsApp";
          };
        };
        copy: {
          icon: "üìã";
          label: "Copiar PIX";
          color: "#6B7280";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Copiar c√≥digo PIX";
          };
        };
        share: {
          icon: "üì§";
          label: "Compartilhar";
          color: "#2563EB";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Compartilhar pagamento";
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Action buttons
  actionButtons: {
    confirmButton: {
      title: "Confirmar Pagamento";
      backgroundColor: "#10B981";
      textColor: "white";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Confirmar pagamento. Toque para confirmar";
      };
    };
    customizeButton: {
      title: "Personalizar";
      backgroundColor: "transparent";
      textColor: "#2563EB";
      border: "1px solid #2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Personalizar pagamento";
      };
    };
    explainButton: {
      title: "Explicar Divis√£o";
      backgroundColor: "transparent";
      textColor: "#6B7280";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Explicar como foi feita a divis√£o";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

### 1.3 Settings & Preferences (iOS)

**Screen:** `SettingsView`

```typescript
interface SettingsView {
  // Navigation
  navigation: {
    title: "Configura√ß√µes";
    backButton: "chevron-left";
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Tela de configura√ß√µes";
    };
  };
  
  // Settings sections
  settingsSections: {
    // Regional settings
    regional: {
      title: "Regi√£o";
      icon: "üåç";
      items: [
        {
          label: "S√£o Paulo";
          value: "SP";
          type: "radio";
          selected: true;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Regi√£o: S√£o Paulo selecionada";
          };
        },
        {
          label: "Rio de Janeiro";
          value: "RJ";
          type: "radio";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Regi√£o: Rio de Janeiro";
          };
        },
        {

          value: "NE";
          type: "radio";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Regi√£o: Nordeste";
          };
        },

          label: "Sul";
          value: "Sul";
          type: "radio";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Regi√£o: Sul";
          };
        }
      ];
    };

    accessibility: {
      title: "Acessibilidade";
      icon: "‚ôø";
      items: [
        {

          };
        },
        {

          type: "toggle";
          enabled: false;

          };
        }
      ];
    };
    
    // Performance settings
    performance: {
      title: "Performance";
      icon: "‚ö°";
      items: [
        {
          label: "Modelo Preferido";

          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Modelo preferido: Autom√°tico";
          };
        },
        {
          label: "Otimiza√ß√£o de Custo";
          type: "toggle";
          enabled: true;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Otimiza√ß√£o de custo ativada";
          };
        },
        {
          label: "Cache Agressivo";
          type: "toggle";
          enabled: true;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Cache agressivo ativado";
          };
        }
      ];
    };
    
    // Payment settings
    payment: {
      title: "Pagamentos";
      icon: "üí∞";
      items: [
        {
          label: "Chave PIX";
          value: "joao@email.com";
          type: "text";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Chave PIX: joao@email.com";
          };
        },
        {
          label: "Nome do Destinat√°rio";
          value: "Jo√£o Silva";
```

## 2. Android App Wireframes

### 2.1 Main Chat Interface (Android)

**Screen:** `MainChatView`

```typescript
interface AndroidMainChatView {
  // Material Design navigation
  navigation: {
    toolbar: {
      title: "RachaAI";
      menuIcon: "menu";
      overflowMenu: ["settings", "help", "about"];
      elevation: 4;
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Barra de navega√ß√£o do RachaAI";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Chat interface with Material Design
  chatInterface: {
    messages: {
      userMessage: {
        bubble: "rounded-right";
        backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
        textColor: "white";
        elevation: 2;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Sua mensagem: {content}";
        };
      };
      aiResponse: {
        bubble: "rounded-left";
        backgroundColor: "#F5F5F5";
        textColor: "#212121";
        elevation: 1;
        culturalPattern: {
          chip: "cultural-pattern-chip";
          color: "#4CAF50";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Padr√£o cultural detectado: {pattern}";
          };
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Claude: {content}";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Input area with Material Design
    inputArea: {
      textInput: {
        placeholder: "Descreva sua despesa...";
        multiline: true;
        maxLines: 4;
        backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF";
        elevation: 2;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Campo de texto para descrever despesa";
        };
      };
      
      // Floating action buttons
      fabButtons: {
        voiceFab: {
          icon: "mic";
          backgroundColor: "#EF4444";
          elevation: 6;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de voz flutuante";
          };
        };
        cameraFab: {
          icon: "camera_alt";
          backgroundColor: "#10B981";
          elevation: 6;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de c√¢mera flutuante";
          };
        };
        sendFab: {
          icon: "send";
          backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
          elevation: 6;
          disabled: "#BDBDBD";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o enviar flutuante";
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Bottom navigation
  bottomNavigation: {
    items: [
      {
        icon: "chat";
        label: "Chat";
        selected: true;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba chat selecionada";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "history";
        label: "Hist√≥rico";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba hist√≥rico";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "group";
        label: "Grupos";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba grupos";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "account_circle";
        label: "Perfil";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba perfil";
        };
      }
    ];
  };
}
```

### 2.2 Payment Confirmation (Android)

**Screen:** `PaymentConfirmationView`

```typescript
interface AndroidPaymentConfirmationView {
  // Material Design card layout
  paymentCard: {
    elevation: 8;
    backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF";
    cornerRadius: 8;
    
    header: {
      title: "Confirma√ß√£o de Pagamento";
      subtitle: "Rod√≠zio Japon√™s";
      icon: "üç£";
      color: "#2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Confirma√ß√£o de pagamento. Rod√≠zio japon√™s";
      };
    };
    
    content: {
      // Payment details with Material Design
      details: {
        totalAmount: {
          label: "Valor Total";
          value: "R$ 180,00";
          typography: "headline4";
          color: "#212121";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Valor total: R$ 180,00";
          };
        };
        participants: {
          label: "Participantes";
          value: "4 pessoas";
          typography: "body1";
          color: "#757575";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "4 participantes";
          };
        };
        individualPayment: {
          label: "Cada um paga";
          value: "R$ 45,00";
          typography: "headline3";
          color: "#4CAF50";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Cada pessoa paga R$ 45,00";
          };
        };
      };
      
      // PIX integration with Material Design
      pixIntegration: {
        qrCode: {
          size: "200x200";
          backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF";
          border: "1px solid #E0E0E0";
          elevation: 2;
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "QR Code PIX para R$ 45,00";
          };
        };
        
        // Material Design buttons
        actionButtons: {
          whatsappButton: {
            icon: "whatsapp";
            label: "WhatsApp";
            backgroundColor: "#25D366";
            textColor: "white";
            accessibility: {
              screenReader: "Compartilhar via WhatsApp";
            };
          };
          copyButton: {
            icon: "content_copy";
            label: "Copiar PIX";
            backgroundColor: "#757575";
            textColor: "white";
            accessibility: {
              screenReader: "Copiar c√≥digo PIX";
            };
          };
          shareButton: {
            icon: "share";
            label: "Compartilhar";
            backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
            textColor: "white";
            accessibility: {
              screenReader: "Compartilhar pagamento";
            };
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Bottom action buttons
  bottomActions: {
    confirmButton: {
      text: "Confirmar Pagamento";
      backgroundColor: "#4CAF50";
      textColor: "white";
      elevation: 4;
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Confirmar pagamento";
      };
    };
    customizeButton: {
      text: "Personalizar";
      backgroundColor: "transparent";
      textColor: "#2563EB";
      border: "1px solid #2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Personalizar pagamento";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

## 3. Progressive Web App (PWA) Wireframes

### 3.1 PWA Main Interface

**Screen:** `PWAMainView`

```typescript
interface PWAMainView {
  // PWA header
  header: {
    title: "RachaAI";
    installButton: {
      icon: "download";
      label: "Instalar App";
      backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Instalar RachaAI como aplicativo";
      };
    };
    menuButton: {
      icon: "menu";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Menu do aplicativo";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // PWA-specific features
  pwaFeatures: {
    // Offline indicator
    offlineIndicator: {
      visible: boolean;
      message: "Modo offline ativo";
      icon: "wifi_off";
      color: "#EF4444";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Aplicativo funcionando offline";
      };
    };
    
    // Sync status
    syncStatus: {
      syncing: boolean;
      lastSync: "√öltima sincroniza√ß√£o: 2 min atr√°s";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Sincronizando dados";
      };
    };
    
    // Service worker status
    serviceWorker: {
      installed: boolean;
      updateAvailable: boolean;
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Atualiza√ß√£o dispon√≠vel";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Chat interface optimized for PWA
  chatInterface: {
    messages: {
      userMessage: {
        bubble: "rounded-right";
        backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
        textColor: "white";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Sua mensagem: {content}";
        };
      };
      aiResponse: {
        bubble: "rounded-left";
        backgroundColor: "#F3F4F6";
        textColor: "#1F2937";
        culturalPattern: {
          badge: "cultural-pattern";
          color: "#10B981";
        };
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Claude: {content}";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Input optimized for mobile web
    inputArea: {
      textInput: {
        placeholder: "Descreva sua despesa...";
        multiline: true;
        maxHeight: 100;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Campo de texto para descrever despesa";
        };
      };
      
      // Touch-optimized buttons
      actionButtons: {
        voiceButton: {
          icon: "üé§";
          size: "large";
          touchTarget: "44px";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de voz. Toque para ativar";
          };
        };
        cameraButton: {
          icon: "üì∑";
          size: "large";
          touchTarget: "44px";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o de c√¢mera. Toque para escanear";
          };
        };
        sendButton: {
          icon: "üì§";
          size: "large";
          touchTarget: "44px";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Bot√£o enviar. Toque para enviar";
          };
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // PWA-specific navigation
  pwaNavigation: {
    type: "bottom-tabs";
    tabs: [
      {
        icon: "chat";
        label: "Chat";
        selected: true;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba chat selecionada";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "history";
        label: "Hist√≥rico";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba hist√≥rico";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "group";
        label: "Grupos";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba grupos";
        };
      },
      {
        icon: "settings";
        label: "Configura√ß√µes";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Aba configura√ß√µes";
        };
      }
    ];
  };
}
```

### 3.2 PWA Offline Experience

**Screen:** `PWAOfflineView`

```typescript
interface PWAOfflineView {
  // Offline header
  offlineHeader: {
    icon: "wifi_off";
    title: "Modo Offline";
    subtitle: "Algumas funcionalidades podem estar limitadas";
    color: "#EF4444";
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Modo offline ativo. Funcionalidades limitadas";
    };
  };
  
  // Offline features
  offlineFeatures: {
    // Offline expense tracking
    expenseTracking: {
      title: "Rastreamento Offline";
      description: "Suas despesas s√£o salvas localmente";
      icon: "save";
      color: "#10B981";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Rastreamento offline ativo";
      };
    };
    
    // Offline calculations
    calculations: {
      title: "C√°lculos Offline";
      description: "Divis√µes b√°sicas funcionam sem internet";
      icon: "calculate";
      color: "#2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "C√°lculos offline dispon√≠veis";
      };
    };
    
    // Sync queue
    syncQueue: {
      title: "Fila de Sincroniza√ß√£o";
      description: "3 despesas aguardando sincroniza√ß√£o";
      icon: "sync";
      color: "#F59E0B";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "3 despesas aguardando sincroniza√ß√£o";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Offline actions
  offlineActions: {
    // Manual sync
    manualSync: {
      title: "Sincronizar Agora";
      icon: "sync";
      backgroundColor: "#2563EB";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Sincronizar dados manualmente";
      };
    };
    
    // View offline data
    viewOfflineData: {
      title: "Ver Dados Offline";
      icon: "storage";
      backgroundColor: "#10B981";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Ver dados salvos offline";
      };
    };
    
    // Clear offline data
    clearOfflineData: {
      title: "Limpar Dados";
      icon: "delete";
      backgroundColor: "#EF4444";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Limpar dados offline";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

---

## 4. Mobile-Specific Features

### 4.1 Camera Integration

**Screen:** `CameraIntegrationView`

```typescript
interface CameraIntegrationView {
  // Camera interface
  cameraInterface: {
    // Camera preview
    preview: {
      aspectRatio: "4:3";
      overlay: {
        receiptFrame: "rectangle-guide";
        text: "Posicione o recibo na √°rea destacada";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Posicione o recibo na √°rea destacada";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Camera controls
    controls: {
      captureButton: {
        icon: "camera";
        size: "large";
        backgroundColor: "#FFFFFF";
        border: "3px solid #2563EB";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Bot√£o de captura. Toque para fotografar";
        };
      };
      flashButton: {
        icon: "flash_on";
        backgroundColor: "transparent";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Bot√£o de flash. Toque para alternar";
        };
      };
      switchCameraButton: {
        icon: "flip_camera";
        backgroundColor: "transparent";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Alternar c√¢mera. Toque para trocar";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Receipt detection
    receiptDetection: {
      enabled: boolean;
      confidence: number;
      feedback: {
        visual: "green-border";
        haptic: "success-vibration";
        audio: "detection-sound";
      };
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Recibo detectado. Capturando imagem";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Processing interface
  processingInterface: {
    // OCR processing
    ocrProcessing: {
      title: "Processando Recibo";
      progress: number; // percentage
      status: "Extracting text...";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Processando recibo. Extraindo texto";
      };
    };
    
    // Data extraction
    dataExtraction: {
      fields: [
        {
          label: "Estabelecimento";
          value: "Restaurante Japon√™s";
          confidence: 0.95;
        },
        {
          label: "Data";
          value: "15/12/2024";
          confidence: 0.98;
        },
        {
          label: "Valor Total";
          value: "R$ 180,00";
          confidence: 0.99;
        },
        {
          label: "Participantes";
          value: "4";
          confidence: 0.85;
        }
      ];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Dados extra√≠dos do recibo. {fields}";
      };
    };
    
    // Manual correction
    manualCorrection: {
      enabled: boolean;
      fields: [
        {
          label: "Estabelecimento";
          value: "Restaurante Japon√™s";
          editable: true;
        },
        {
          label: "Valor Total";
          value: "R$ 180,00";
          editable: true;
        },
        {
          label: "Participantes";
          value: "4";
          editable: true;
        }
      ];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Editar dados extra√≠dos. Toque para corrigir";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

### 4.2 Voice Input Integration

**Screen:** `VoiceInputView`

```typescript
interface VoiceInputView {
  // Voice interface
  voiceInterface: {
    // Voice activation
    activation: {
      button: {
        icon: "mic";
        size: "large";
        backgroundColor: "#EF4444";
        pulse: true;
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Bot√£o de microfone. Toque para ativar";
        };
      };
      
      // Voice feedback
      feedback: {
        visual: "waveform-animation";
        audio: "activation-sound";
        haptic: "long-vibration";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Microfone ativado. Fale sua despesa";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Voice recording
    recording: {
      // Recording indicator
      indicator: {
        type: "waveform";
        color: "#EF4444";
        animation: "pulse";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Gravando √°udio";
        };
      };
      
      // Recording controls
      controls: {
        stopButton: {
          icon: "stop";
          backgroundColor: "#EF4444";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Parar grava√ß√£o";
          };
        };
        cancelButton: {
          icon: "close";
          backgroundColor: "#6B7280";
          accessibility: {
            screenReader: "Cancelar grava√ß√£o";
          };
        };
      };
      
      // Recording duration
      duration: {
        current: "00:15";
        max: "02:00";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Gravando h√° 15 segundos";
        };
      };
    };
    
    // Speech recognition
    recognition: {
      // Recognition status
      status: {
        type: "processing" | "success" | "error";
        message: "Processando √°udio...";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Processando reconhecimento de voz";
        };
      };
      
      // Recognized text
      recognizedText: {
        text: "Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180";
        confidence: 0.94;
        alternatives: [
          "Rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas, R$ 180",
          "Rolou um rod√≠zio, 4 pessoas, R$ 180"
        ];
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Reconhecido: Rolou um rod√≠zio japon√™s, 4 pessoas";
        };
      };
      
      // Cultural pattern detection
      patternDetection: {
        detected: "rodizio";
        confidence: 0.95;
        regionalVariation: "SP";
        accessibility: {
          screenReader: "Padr√£o cultural detectado: Rod√≠zio japon√™s";
        };
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Voice settings
  voiceSettings: {
    // Language settings
    language: {
      current: "pt-BR";
      options: ["pt-BR", "en-US", "es-ES"];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Idioma: Portugu√™s do Brasil";
      };
    };
    
    // Regional accent
    accent: {
      current: "SP";
      options: ["SP", "RJ", "NE", "Sul"];
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Sotaque: S√£o Paulo";
      };
    };
    
    // Voice commands
    commands: [
      "dividir despesa",
      "confirmar pagamento",
      "explicar divis√£o",
      "compartilhar PIX"
    ];
    accessibility: {
      screenReader: "Comandos de voz dispon√≠veis: dividir despesa, confirmar pagamento";
    };
  };
}
```

## 5. Mobile Performance Optimization

### 5.1 Network Optimization

**Screen:** `NetworkOptimizationView`

```typescript
interface NetworkOptimizationView {
  // Network status
  networkStatus: {
    // Current network
    current: {
      type: "4G" | "5G" | "WiFi";
      speed: "fast" | "medium" | "slow";
      region: "SP" | "RJ" | "NE" | "Sul";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Rede {type} detectada. Velocidade {speed}";
      };
    };
    
    // Optimization settings
    optimization: {
      modelPreference: "haiku" | "sonnet" | "opus";
      cacheStrategy: "aggressive" | "balanced" | "conservative";
      imageQuality: "high" | "medium" | "low";
      realTimeUpdates: boolean;
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Otimiza√ß√£o: {model} com cache {strategy}";
      };
    };
    
    // Performance metrics
    performance: {
      responseTime: number; // ms
      dataUsage: number; // MB
      batteryImpact: "low" | "medium" | "high";
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Tempo de resposta: {time}ms. Uso de dados: {data}MB";
      };
    };
  };
  
  // Peak hour optimization
  peakHourOptimization: {
    // Current time
    currentTime: {
      hour: number; // 0-23
      dayOfWeek: number; // 0-6
      isPeakHour: boolean;
      accessibility: {
        screenReader: "Hor√°rio atual: {hour}:00. {peak}";
      };
    };
    
    // Peak hour settings
    peakHourSettings: {
      morning: {
        hour: "7:00-9:00";
        optimization: "haiku";
        explanation: "Hor√°rio de pico matinal";
      };
      lunch: {
        hour: "12:00-14:00";
        optimization: "sonnet";
        explanation: "Hor√°rio de almo√ßo";
      };
      evening: {
        hour: "18:00-20:00";
        optimization: "sonnet";
        explanation: "Hor√°rio de jantar";
      };
      weekend: {
        hour: "19:00-22:00";
        optimization: "sonnet";
        explanation: "Fim de semana";
      };
    };
  };
}
```

---

## 6. Success Criteria

### **Mobile App Success Metrics:**
- **App Store Ratings:** 4.5+ stars on iOS/Android
- **PWA Installation:** 60%+ users install PWA
- **Offline Usage:** 40%+ usage in offline mode
- **Voice Input Accuracy:** 90%+ accuracy for Brazilian Portuguese
- **Camera Recognition:** 85%+ accuracy for receipt scanning
- **Performance:** <2s response time on mobile networks

### **Mobile UX Requirements:**
- **Native platform guidelines** (iOS Human Interface, Material Design)
- **Touch-optimized interfaces** (44px minimum touch targets)
- **Offline functionality** with sync capabilities
- **Voice and camera integration** with Brazilian optimization
- **PWA capabilities** for web-to-app experience
- **Performance optimization** for Brazilian mobile networks

The mobile app wireframes ensure RachaAI provides **native-quality mobile experiences** with **Brazilian cultural adaptation**, **accessibility support**, and **optimal performance** across iOS, Android, and PWA platforms.
